title: Media Control Update - Post

href.description: This is the target URI, it can be specified as a Relative Reference or fully-qualified URI. Relative Reference should be used along with the di parameter to make it unique.

rel.description: The relation of the target URI referenced by the link to the context URI

action.description: The name of the media action.

allowed_values.description: The allowed values for the action

range.description: The allowed range for the action

range_step.description: Step value across the defined range

playState.description: Allowed media control play state values.

mediaSpeed.description: Allowed media control play speed values.

anyOf.description: This is the target URI, it can be specified as a Relative Reference or fully-qualified URI.
Reference time for the absolute time in ISO8601 format.
Supports Rate Control for float values and Frame By Frame for integer values for both positive and negative values.

lastAction.description: Last Action received for media control.

actions.description: The array of media actions that are supported for media control.
